QuestionText: Which of the following is the primary feature that distinguishes cloud computing from traditional computing?
What is the name of the cloud service model that provides hardware resources over the internet instead of software?
Which type of cloud deployment model involves services provided exclusively to a single organization?
Which cloud platform service allows developers to build, deploy, and manage applications without managing underlying infrastructure?
In cloud computing, what does multi-tenancy refer to?
OptionA: Having multiple physical servers in a single data center
OptionB: Sharing resources among multiple users or organizations
CorrectAnswer: Sharing resources among multiple users or organizations

QuestionText: Which cloud feature ensures that resources are allocated automatically based on demand?
What is the main security risk in utilizing public cloud services?
Which protocol is most commonly used in transferring data within cloud services?
What is the concept behind edge computing in relation to cloud computing?
OptionA: Performing computation at the source of the data
OptionB: Utilizing more server hardware for scalability
OptionC: Optimizing virtual networks for high speeds
CorrectAnswer: Performing computation at the source of the data
